app.title: ACTIVITY TRACKER
app.description1: A fully local app for logging activity and understanding your productivity.
app.description2: Every X minutes, a lightweight popup asks what you are doing.
app.description3: You can also set an activity manually and only confirm it every Y minutes. All timings and many other options can be adjusted in settings.
app.supportText1: If this helped you stay focused or save time, you can support the project.
app.supportText2: Even €0.10 per hour saved would already mean a lot, but any support is appreciated.
